i1.name: Living Vengeance
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Varus''' gains 40% {{as|(+ 30% '''bonus''' attack speed)}} {{sti|as|'''bonus''' attack speed}} for 5 seconds upon an enemy champion {{tip|takedown}}, and 20% {{as|(+ 15% '''bonus''' attack speed)}} '''bonus''' attack speed on non-champion kills.

q1.name: Piercing Arrow
q1.target_range: {{passive progression/deprecated version|11|type=channel time|925 to 1625|0 to 2|displayformula=925{{plus}}(70 per 0.2 seconds). ''This is capped at 2 seconds.''}}
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Varus''' {{tip|channel|charges}} for up to 4 seconds to gradually increase ''Piercing Arrow's'' {{sti|range}} and damage while being {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 20%. ''Piercing Arrow'' can be recast at any time within its duration.
If the charge completes without reactivation, ''Piercing Arrow'' is canceled, refunding 50% of its {{sti|mana|{{as|mana cost}}}}.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Varus''' fires a piercing arrow in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies struck, which is increased by {{passive progression/deprecated version|11|type=channel time|key=%|0 to 50|0 to 2|displayformula=5% per 0.2 seconds. ''This is capped at 2 seconds.''}}. The arrow's damage is reduced to {{passive progression/deprecated version|6|type=enemies hit|key=%|100 to 40;33|0 to 5|displayformula=100% - (15% per enemy hit). ''This is capped at a minimum of 33% damage.''}}.
Detonating {{ai|Blighted Quiver|Varus|Blight}} stacks on an enemy champion reduces ''Piercing Arrow's'' {{sti|cooldown}} by 3 seconds.
leveling:
{{st|Minimum Physical Damage|{{ap|15/1.5 to 235/1.5|round=2}} {{as|(+ {{ap|125/1.5 to 145/1.5|round=2}}% AD)}}|Minimum Fully Reduced Damage|{{ap|15/1.5*0.33 to 235/1.5*0.33|round=2}} {{as|(+ {{ap|(125/1.5)*0.33 to (145/1.5)*0.33|round=2}}% AD)}}}}
{{st|Maximum Physical Damage|{{ap|15 to 235}} {{as|(+ {{ap|125 to 145|round=2}}% AD)}}|Maximum Fully Reduced Damage|{{ap|15*0.33 to 235*0.33}} {{as|(+ {{ap|125*0.33 to 145*0.33|round=2}}% AD)}}}}
q1.notes:
* The range of the spell will always be displayed, even as it increases.
* ''Piercing Arrow'' will cast from wherever '''Varus''' is at the end of the channel.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Varus''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|charge|attack=false|move=true|cast={{ai|Blighted Quiver|Varus}} is usable during the first {{fd|0.25}} seconds, otherwise, it's disabled. {{ai|Hail of Arrows|Varus}} and {{ai|Chain of Corruption|Varus}} are disabled. This ability recasts to end channel.|items=false|consume=Disabled, but can still use trinkets.|spells=true, true, false, false, recasts}}

w1.name: Blighted Quiver
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Varus'''' [[basic attack]]s deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and apply a [[stack]] of ''Blight'' for 6 seconds, stacking up to 3 times, refreshing on subsequent attacks.

'''Varus' ''' other abilities detonate ''Blight'' on enemies upon damaging them, dealing {{as|magic damage}} for each stack on the target. This damage is capped at 360 against {{tip|monster|monsters}}.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Varus'''' next {{ai|Piercing Arrow|Varus}} deals {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|5|key=%|changedisplay=true|6 to 14|1 to 13}} of the target's '''missing''' health}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}, increased by {{passive progression/deprecated version|type=Piercing Arrow channel time|11|key=%|0 to 50|0 to 2|formula=5% per 0.2 seconds. ''This is capped at 2 seconds.''}}, for a maximum of {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|5|key=%|changedisplay=true|6*1.5 to 14*1.5|1 to 13}} of the target's '''missing''' health}}. This damage is capped at 360 against monsters. If '''Varus''' is not charging {{ai|Piercing Arrow|Varus}}, ''Blighted Quiver'' may be recast after 1 second and will go on a 1 second cooldown if it isn't used within {{fd|5.5}} seconds of its activation or immediately if '''Varus''' dies.

''Blighted Quiver'' can be cast during the first {{fd|0.25}} seconds of {{ais|Piercing Arrow|Varus}} charge. ''Blighted Quiver'' is placed on full cooldown even if the duration ends and the arrow is not fired or if the charge is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}}.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Varus''' cancels ''Blighted Quiver'' and puts it on a 1 second {{sti|cooldown}}.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage per Stack|{{as|{{ap|3 to 5}}% {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health|health)}}|Maximum Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|9 to 15}}% {{as|(+ 6% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health|health)}}}}
w1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will not block the {{tip|on-hit}} damage but will block the consuming damage if the target is hit by his abilities.
* ''Blighted Quiver's'' active damage is dealt after the damage of {{ai|Piercing Arrow|Varus}}.
* Using the {{sbc|Active}} of ''Blighted Quiver'' does not count as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{nie|Spellblade}} or charging {{ii|Spellbinder}}.
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Blighted Quiver's'' on-hit interaction with ''parrying'' effects ({{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|block}}, {{tip|blind}}).

effects.str: • Bonus Magic Damage: (+ 25% AP)

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Magic Damage per Stack|{{as|{{ap|3 to 5}}% {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health|health)}}|Maximum Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|9 to 15}}% {{as|(+ 6% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health|health)}}}}

e1.name: Hail of Arrows
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Varus''' fires a hail of arrows at the target location, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies hit on impact.
The area is desecrated for 4 seconds, {{tip|slow|slowing}} all enemies within and applying {{tip|Grievous Wounds}}.
''Hail of Arrows will cast at max range if cast beyond that.''
e1.notes: * {{tip|Slow}} lingers for {{fd|0.25}} seconds after leaving the marked area.

r1.name: Chain of Corruption
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Varus''' flings out a tendril of corruption in the target direction that infects the first enemy champion hit, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|sight|revealing}} and {{tip|root|rooting}} them for 2 seconds while inflicting them with full stacks of {{ai|Blighted Quiver|Varus|Blight}} over {{fd|1.5}} seconds.

On impact, the tendril seeks out nearby enemy champions for 2 seconds, after which they are also infected. Tendrils will continue to spread until there are no champions in range that have not already been affected.
''Chain of Corruption'' will attempt to spread even if the first target dies or becomes free of the {{tip|root}}.
''The tendril seeks targets regardless of having {{tip|sight}} of them or not.''
r1.notes:
* Enemy champions can be targeted again by the corruption's tether if they were not infected the previous time, even if they were targeted and got out of range.
* ''Chain of Corruption'' will not infect {{tip|cc-immune}} targets or those protected by {{tip|spell shield|spell shields}} (but will still seek them).
* The tendril cannot seek enemy champions that are {{tip|untargetable}}.
* ''Chain of Corruption'' will cast from wherever '''Varus''' is at the end of the cast time.
* Consuming the ''Blight's'' stacks applied by ''Chain of Corruption'' will deal bonus magic damage based on {{ais|Blighted Quiver|Varus}} rank. If the ability hasn't been ranked yet, the three ''Blight'' stacks will still be applied but they will be considered to be at rank 0, dealing {{as|{{fd|1.25}}% {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health}} per stack.
